sentences.en: Each year more than 15,000 students enrol with the college.
sentences.cn: 每年,超过15,000名学生在这所大学登记注册.

sentences.en: I like your institute but I do not want to enrol.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢你们学院但我不想报名去你院.

sentences.en: I must enrol the children for piano lessons before next week.
sentences.cn: 我必须在下周前给孩子们注册上钢琴课.

sentences.en: I volunteered to enrol in the 800 meters race.
sentences.cn: 我自告奋勇去报名参加800米长跑.

sentences.en: I wish to enrol the Teo Ann Kuan & abide by its constitution.
sentences.cn: 本人愿意加入潮安会馆为会员并遵守本章程.

sentences.en: If you enrol at a gym that's miles away, you won't be visiting it as often as you should.
sentences.cn: 如果你加入的健身馆非常远，就不会去得那么经常了。

sentences.en: In September we enrol in school.
International students must not enrol in on - line courses.
sentences.cn: 国际的学生不能在线的课程中登记.

sentences.en: It is possible, some schools may not enrol full person!
sentences.cn: 是可以的, 有的学校可能没招满人的!

sentences.en: More and more universities abroad come to enrol new students in China.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的外国大学到中国来招生.

sentences.en: They decided to enrol him as a member of the society.
sentences.cn: 他们决定吸收他成为会社的成员.

sentences.en: What do I get if I enrol?
sentences.cn: 如果我报名加入,我可以获得什么?

sentences.en: Why should we enrol students directly?
sentences.cn: 为什么要直接招生 呢 ?

sentences.en: You need to enrol before the end of August.
sentences.cn: 你必须在八月底前注册。
